data.message: Uhhhmmmm obviously some of ya didn't bother to read up about this album when it was announced otherwise ya would have known it was gonna be a double disc album- ONE disc with original music and THE OTHER ONE having the labels greatest hits - and wouldn't be wasting time complaining bout how ya heard these songs before and disappointed....yes this is an label complication album and a follow up to re up which was a good album btw...stop complaining cause ya only got ya selves to be disappointed in do your homework next time
